thread.title: Thieves hid bug-laden ads in online obituaries, researchers say
thread.title_full: Thieves hid bug-laden ads in online obituaries, researchers say - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Sean Sposito
title: Thieves hid bug-laden ads in online obituaries, researchers say
text: A criminal campaign attempting to take advantage of senior citizens by implanting malware on online obituaries pages was at least partially disrupted by Cisco Systems security researchers this summer.
